reviewsJson.markdown:
**Specs:**

- percentage used: 3%
- steep time: 1 month
- PG/VG ratio: 50/50
- vaped on NarDA, 1 ohm coil, 12-20 watts

 

**Flavor Properties:**

- sweet
- mild

 

**Relatable Flavors:**

- cotton candy and faint nuts, in other words (Ethyl Maltol and Acetyl Pyrazine, almost for sure)
- really nothing more to this flavor

 

**Mouth Feel:**

- medium density

 

**Off Flavors:**

- none

 

**Position In A Recipe:**

- use this to sweeten a mix

 

**Suggested Percentage:**

- 1-3%

 

**Pairings:**

- RY4 blends or any tobacco mixes you want to sweeten

 

**Conclusion:**

- This is surprisingly just cotton candy and faint nuts, absolutely no tobacco taste to it.
- I suppose it's called a tobacco because it would make a good sweetener in tobacco mixes, but then again, if you have TPA Cotton Candy and Acetyl Pyrazine I'm fairly confident you could replicate this exactly.
reviewsJson.author: T_Mace
reviewsJson.title: Dromedary (S'Camel)
